com.example.team04adventure.Model

Class SQLiteHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.example.team04adventure.Model.SQLiteHelper

  • public class SQLiteHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    SQLiteHelper is meant to handle required SQLite operations that the user does not have access to. It also contains the raw queries to be accessed from StorageManager.
    Author:
    Team04Adventure
